forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 5 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the city finds itself cloaked in a gentle embrace of partly cloudy skies, with the temperature nestling around a comfortable 55 degrees. A soothing southwest wind dances through the streets, providing a refreshing breath of air against the backdrop of urban life, though gusts can rise to a brisk 20 miles per hour, adding a hint of excitement to the tranquility. The horizon, while adorned with the soft palette of twilight, hints at the warmth to come. 

Tomorrow, the sun will rise bright and inviting, promising a sunny day with temperatures climbing to near 70. As the afternoon unfolds, you may find those numbers falling slightly, giving way to an inviting, golden light that glimmers off the vibrant buildings and the waters of the Bay. The current marine layer, residing along the edges of the city, creates a patchwork effect as it mingles with clearer skies, yet will likely dissipate as the day progresses. Dressing in layers would be prudent; a light sweater or jacket for the cool evening, transitioning to a comfortable t-shirt or blouse for the midday warmth, lets you glide through the shifting embrace of the day. A leisurely walk along the Embarcadero would be a splendid way to relish the pleasantness of the surroundings, or perhaps a quiet moment at a local café, allowing the gentle hustle of city life to ease into your own rhythm.
